sentences.sContent: Parenting is about giving your child security and love.
sentences.sCn: 养育儿女就是要给他们保护和爱。

sentences.sContent: Workers want greater job security (= not being in danger of losing your job ) .
sentences.sCn: 工人们希望有更多的工作保障。

sentences.sContent: This insurance plan offers your family financial security in the event of your death.
sentences.sCn: 这份保险能在你死后给你的家人提供经济保障。

sentences.sContent: ...The fix is a security technology used heavily outside the US...
...peace and security adviser for UN Women...
...she concluded the session with a brief restatement of how the new system will improve security and peace of mind in the municipal building...
...was responsible for presenting its new security plan to the public...
...Would the new system create long lines to get into the building like the line in the airport security checks...
...she explained that the sufficient number of security guards would be working at peak hours to speed things along...
...It was part of the airport security check...
...What does the speaker say about security in Greenville...
...the ageing of the developed countries will have a number of serious security implications...

phrases.pCn: 网络安全；网络安全性；网络保密
粮食安全；食品安全；食物保障

words.tran: 安全的；无虑的；有把握的；稳当的
安全的；可靠的（secure的比较级形式）
安全地；牢固地；安心地；有把握地
获得安全；船抛锚；停止工作

trans.tranCn: 安全， 保障； 抵押品； 证券
trans.tranOther: protection from bad things that could happen to you
